help_head: Get help by clicking on these buttons ğŸ˜‡
help_extract:
**How to extract? ğŸ¤”**

**1.** `Send the file or link that you want to extract.`
**2.** `Click on extract button (If you sent a link use "Url Extract" button. If it's a file just use "File Extract" button).`


**Note:**
    **1.** `If your archive is password protected select` **(Password) Extract ğŸ“‚** `mode. Bot isn't a GOD to know your file's password so If this happens just send that password!`
    
    **2.** `Please don't send corrupted archives! If you sent a one by a mistake just send` **/clean** `command!`
    
    **3.** `If your archive have more than 90 files in it then bot can't show all the extracted files to select from. So in that case if you can't see your file in the buttons just click on` "Upload All â™»ï¸" `button. It'll send all extracted files to you!`
help_upmode:
**How to change upload mode? ğŸ¤”**

**1.** `Send` **/mode** `command to the bot.`
**2.** `Select the appropriate option.`
help_backup:
**How to backup my files ğŸ¤”**

This bot's server do a clean restart every 24 hours (heroku). Which means your files will be completely removed after sometime.
Before that happens, you can backup all of your files to gofile.io

**1.** `Send` **/backup** `command to the bot.`
**2.** `Select the appropriate option.`
help_thumb:
**How to change thumbnail? ğŸ¤”**

By default, videos uses a thumbnail generated by `ffmpeg` and files doesn't have one.
If you want to set up your own thumbnail, you can do so using below commands ğŸ‘‡,


    â€¢ **/set_thumb** - To set a thumbnail

    â€¢ **/get_thumb** - To get the current thumbnail

    â€¢ **/del_thumb** - To delete the current thumbnail
help_lang:
**How to change the language? ğŸ¤”**

The default language is English. However you can change it to your language if the translation is available. To change the current language send **/set_lang** command.

Want to help with translation? Please [read this](https://github.com/Itz-fork/Unzipper-Bot/tree/main/unzipper/localization#contribute-to-the-translation)

**Extraction Failed ğŸ˜•!**

**What to do?**

 - `Please make sure archive isn't corrupted`
 - `Please make sure that you selected the right mode`
 - `May be Your archive format isn't supported ğŸ˜”`

**Please report this at @Nexa_bots**

alert_splitted_arc:
**Splitted archive detected!**


**1.** `Send the other parts of the archive one by one.`
**2.** `When you're done, send` **/done** `command.`


Wanna cancel the current process? Hit **/clean** command!
alert_process_running_already:
`Already one process is going on, Don't spam you idiot ğŸ˜‘!` 

Wanna cancel the current process? Just send **/clean** command!
alert_downloading_part: `Oh, looks like another part of the splitted archive was sent by YOU ğŸ‘€!`
alert_part_exists: `Dawg, I already have this file ğŸ˜‘!`
